title: Bronx double shooting in Foxhurst leaves 2 hurt
content:
FOXHURST, Bronx (WABC) --
Two people were shot in the Foxhurst section of the Bronx Saturday morning.
According to the New York City Police Department, at 3:30 a.m. officers responded to the 1000 block of Tiffany Street where they found two men shot in the chest and torso.
The victims were approached by two men who shot them, then fled the scene.
They were taken to Lincoln Hospital. A 17-year-old victim is critical but stable, and the other is in serious condition.
There have been no arrests and the investigation is ongoing.
